description: This file defines an AiController class responsible for controlling the AI paddle in a ping pong game. It adjusts the paddle's position based on the ball's position with some noise for unpredictability, and respects game mode and area constraints.

classes.name: AiController
classes.description: A controller class managing AI paddle movement in the game.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the AI paddle's position based on game state, with noise and speed constraints.
